items.sentence: Banks as well as some companies won\'t be open next Monday.
How much longer do you think it\'ll be until Tom gets here?
I think Tom doesn\'t swim very often, but I could be wrong.
Tom was in a stolen car when the police finally caught him.
Tom was really glad to hear that Mary had passed her exams.
Tom was stupid enough to challenge Mary to a game of chess.
Tom was unable to remember what he had eaten for breakfast.
Tom was caught red-handed, stealing from the cash register.
Tom was definitely interested, but he tried not to show it.
I\'m sorry, I don\'t understand what you\'re trying to say.
